metadata.dc:author: Vega-Franco, L
metadata.dc:description: This review describes the chemical composition of the elemental diet and the metabolic findings which support its management in medical and surgical entities. The efficacy of the elemental diet has been reported in a variety of gastrointestinal problems and diseases characterized by an increase of the rate of body catabolism. The procedure used in the administration of this type of diet and the potential risk of complications in children are mentioned.
metadata.dc:title: La dieta elemental en problemas medicoquir√∫rgicos.
[Basic diet in medicosurgical problems].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
